company_description:
At Charrette, we specialise in high-end interior design, transforming spaces with a keen
eye for detail and timeless aesthetics. From concept to completion, we deliver bespoke
solutions using locally crafted cabinetry and premium international fittings. Our dedicated
team is committed to exceptional quality and complete client satisfaction. We look forward
to the opportunity to bring your vision to life.
payment_terms:
To confirm your order, full payment is required. If you choose to proceed with installation
with us, this amount will be deducted from the contract.
